titles: God's zeal thundered forth, against all those magistrates, bishops, priests and people of this city of London, who have deserted their brethren in this day of sore calamity.
author: R. C. (Richard Crane)
date: Printed the 4th. day of the 6th. moneth, 1665.
notes: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
